articles.title: Warner Bros. Games is working on another live-service game, despite Suicide Squad flop - Eurogamer
articles.description: Warner Bros. Games is working on a new live-service game, despite the high profile flop of Suicide Squad last year.

articles.title: Battlefield 6 Maps Leak: All 11 Multiplayer Maps and 4 Remasters Revealed Via Datamine - The Game Post
articles.description: Battlefield 6's multiplayer reveal is just days away, and a new datamined leak has just revealed 11 multiplayer maps plus 4 remastered classics.

articles.title: First look at the iPhone 17 Pro? These public images confirm big design and camera upgrades - ZDNet
articles.description: A series of images on X hint at a redesigned camera bar for the upcoming iPhone 17 series, in line with recent leaks and rumors.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 and Switch update 20.3.0 out now, patch notes - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: Nintendo Switch 2 and Switch just received a new version 20.3.0 update, and you can read the official patch notes here.

articles.title: Mario Paint scribbles into the Super NES collection - Nintendo
articles.description: Stir your creativity with Mario Grab your favorite smock and palette, because the Mario Paint™ game is now available to play with a Nintendo Switch Online* membership! Connect a compatible USB mouse (sold separately) to play the game on your Nintend…
